verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:21
verses.text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:22
verses.text: Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:23
verses.text: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:24
verses.text: For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:
